# package_name

Description. 
The package bem_vindo is used to:
	- Print Bem Vindo 
	-

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install bem_vindo
```bash
pip install bem_vindo
```

## Usage

```python
from package_name import file1_name
file1_name.bem_vindo()
```
